Author: Koenari
Name: Himbeertoni Raid Tool
Description: A collection of useful tools for RaidGroups, including loot management
Changelog:
+ Added the ability to manually track items in inventory
* Fixed tribe of chartacter not being saved
* beautify Ui
+ show if item can be bought / exchanged

+ You can evaluate loot for all jobs in Solo groups
